verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. And he \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto him, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, There were \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* in \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*; the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w rich|strong="H6223"\w*, and the \w other|strong="H0259"\w* \w poor|strong="H7326"\w*.
The \w rich|strong="H6223"\w* \add man\add* had \w exceeding|strong="H3966"\w* \w many|strong="H7235"\w* \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w* and \w herds|strong="H1241"\w*:

But the \w poor|strong="H7326"\w* \add man\add* had nothing, save \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w little|strong="H6996"\w* ewe \w lamb|strong="H3535"\w*, which he had \w bought|strong="H7069"\w* and nourished \w up|strong="H2421"\w*: and it grew \w up|strong="H1431"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w* with him, and with his \w children|strong="H1121"\w*; it did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* of his own \w meat|strong="H6595"\w*, and \w drank|strong="H8354"\w* of his own \w cup|strong="H3563"\w*, and \w lay|strong="H7901"\w* in his \w bosom|strong="H2436"\w*, and was unto him as a \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*.\f + \fr 12.3 \ft meat: Heb. morsel\f*

And there \w came|strong="H0935"\w* a \w traveller|strong="H1982"\w* unto the \w rich|strong="H6223"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, and he \w spared|strong="H2550"\w* to \w take|strong="H3947"\w* of his own \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* and of his own \w herd|strong="H1241"\w*, to \w dress|strong="H6213"\w* for the wayfaring \w man|strong="H0732"\w* that was \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto him; but \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w poor|strong="H7326"\w* \w man’s|strong="H0376"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3535"\w*, and \w dressed|strong="H6213"\w* it for the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that was \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to him.

And \w David’s|strong="H1732"\w* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* was \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w* \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w* against the \w man|strong="H0376"\w*; and he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w*, \add As\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* this \add thing\add* shall \w surely|strong="H1121"\w* \w die|strong="H4194"\w*:\f + \fr 12.5 \ft shall…: or, is worthy to die, or, is a son of death\f*

And he shall \w restore|strong="H7999"\w* the \w lamb|strong="H3535"\w* \w fourfold|strong="H0706"\w*, \w because|strong="H6118"\w* he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*, and \w because|strong="H0834"\w* he had no \w pity|strong="H2550"\w*.

¶ And \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, Thou \add art\add* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w*. Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, I \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* thee \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and I \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* thee out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*;

And I \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* thee thy \w master’s|strong="H0113"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and thy \w master’s|strong="H0113"\w* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* into thy \w bosom|strong="H2436"\w*, and \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* thee the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* and of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*; and if \add that had been\add* too \w little|strong="H4592"\w*, I would moreover have \w given|strong="H3254"\w* unto thee \w such|strong="H2007"\w* and such \w things|strong="H2007"\w*.

Wherefore hast thou \w despised|strong="H0959"\w* the \w commandment|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in his \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*? thou hast \w killed|strong="H5221"\w* \w Uriah|strong="H0223"\w* the \w Hittite|strong="H2850"\w* with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and hast \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \add to be\add* thy \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, and hast \w slain|strong="H2026"\w* him with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*.

Now therefore the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* shall \w never|strong="H5704"\w* \w depart|strong="H5493"\w* from thine \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; \w because|strong="H6118"\w* thou hast \w despised|strong="H0959"\w* me, and hast \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* the \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* of \w Uriah|strong="H0223"\w* the \w Hittite|strong="H2850"\w* to be thy \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*.

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, Behold, I will raise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* against thee out of thine own \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and I will \w take|strong="H3947"\w* thy \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* before thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, and \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \add them\add* unto thy \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*, and he shall \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* with thy \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of this \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*.

For thou \w didst|strong="H6213"\w* \add it\add* \w secretly|strong="H5643"\w*: but I will \w do|strong="H6213"\w* this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* before all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and before the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w*, I have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* against the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*. And \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* also hath put \w away|strong="H5674"\w* thy \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*; thou shalt not \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w Howbeit|strong="H0657"\w*, because by this \w deed|strong="H1697"\w* thou hast \w given|strong="H5006"\w* great \w occasion|strong="H5006"\w* to the \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* to \w blaspheme|strong="H5006"\w*, the \w child|strong="H1121"\w* also \add that is\add* \w born|strong="H3209"\w* unto thee shall \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

¶ And \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* \w departed|strong="H3212"\w* unto his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*. And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w struck|strong="H5062"\w* the \w child|strong="H3206"\w* that \w Uriah’s|strong="H0223"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and it was very \w sick|strong="H0605"\w*.

\w David|strong="H1732"\w* therefore \w besought|strong="H1245"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* for the \w child|strong="H5288"\w*; and \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w fasted|strong="H6684"\w*, and went \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, and \w lay|strong="H7901"\w* all \w night|strong="H3885"\w* upon the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 12.16 \ft fasted: Heb. fasted a fast\f*

And the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of his \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, \add and went\add* to him, to raise him \w up|strong="H6965"\w* from the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: but he \w would|strong="H0014"\w* not, neither did he \w eat|strong="H1262"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* with them.

And it came to pass on the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, that the \w child|strong="H3206"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*. And the \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* to \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* him that the \w child|strong="H3206"\w* was \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*: for they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, while the \w child|strong="H3206"\w* was yet \w alive|strong="H2416"\w*, we \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto him, and he would not \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto our \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*: how will he \w then|strong="H6213"\w* \w vex|strong="H7451"\w* \w himself|strong="H6213"\w*, if we \w tell|strong="H0559"\w* him that the \w child|strong="H3206"\w* is \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*?\f + \fr 12.18 \ft vex: Heb. do hurt\f*

But when \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w whispered|strong="H3907"\w*, \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w perceived|strong="H0995"\w* that the \w child|strong="H3206"\w* was \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*: therefore \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, Is the \w child|strong="H3206"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*? And they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, He is \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*.

Then \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* from the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w washed|strong="H7364"\w*, and \w anointed|strong="H5480"\w* \add himself\add*, and \w changed|strong="H2498"\w* his \w apparel|strong="H8071"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w worshipped|strong="H7812"\w*: then he \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to his own \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; and when he \w required|strong="H7592"\w*, they \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* before him, and he did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* unto him, What \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \add is\add* this that thou hast \w done|strong="H6213"\w*? thou didst \w fast|strong="H6684"\w* and \w weep|strong="H1058"\w* for the \w child|strong="H3206"\w*, \add while it was\add* \w alive|strong="H2416"\w*; but when the \w child|strong="H3206"\w* was \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, thou didst \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* and \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, While the \w child|strong="H3206"\w* was yet \w alive|strong="H2416"\w*, I \w fasted|strong="H6684"\w* and \w wept|strong="H1058"\w*: for I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Who can \w tell|strong="H3045"\w* \add whether\add* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will be \w gracious|strong="H2603"\w* to me, that the \w child|strong="H3206"\w* may \w live|strong="H2416"\w*?

But now he is \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, wherefore should I \w fast|strong="H6684"\w*? \w can|strong="H3201"\w* I bring him back \w again|strong="H7725"\w*? I shall \w go|strong="H1980"\w* to him, but he shall not \w return|strong="H7725"\w* to me.

¶ And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w comforted|strong="H5162"\w* \w Bath-sheba|strong="H1339"\w* his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, and went \w in|strong="H0935"\w* unto her, and \w lay|strong="H7901"\w* with her: and she \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* a \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and he \w called|strong="H7121"\w* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*: and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w loved|strong="H0157"\w* him.

And he \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*; and he \w called|strong="H7121"\w* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w Jedidiah|strong="H3041"\w*, because of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 12.25 \ft Jedidiah: that is, Beloved of the \+nd LORD\+nd*\f*

¶ And \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* against \w Rabbah|strong="H7237"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3920"\w* the \w royal|strong="H4410"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

And \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I have \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* against \w Rabbah|strong="H7237"\w*, and have \w taken|strong="H3920"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*.

Now therefore \w gather|strong="H0622"\w* the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w together|strong="H0622"\w*, and \w encamp|strong="H2583"\w* against the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and \w take|strong="H3920"\w* it: lest I \w take|strong="H3920"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and it be \w called|strong="H7121"\w* after my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.\f + \fr 12.28 \ft it be called…: Heb. my name be called upon it\f*

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w together|strong="H0622"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Rabbah|strong="H7237"\w*, and \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* against it, and \w took|strong="H3920"\w* it.

And he \w took|strong="H3947"\w* their \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w crown|strong="H5850"\w* from off his \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, the \w weight|strong="H4948"\w* whereof \add was\add* a \w talent|strong="H3603"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* with the \w precious|strong="H3368"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*: and it was \add set\add* on \w David’s|strong="H1732"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*. And he brought \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* the \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* in \w great|strong="H3966"\w* \w abundance|strong="H7235"\w*.\f + \fr 12.30 \ft in great…: Heb. very great\f*

And he brought \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add were\add* therein, and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \add them\add* under \w saws|strong="H4050"\w*, and under \w harrows|strong="H2757"\w* of \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*, and under \w axes|strong="H4037"\w* of \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*, and made them \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* through the \w brickkiln|strong="H4404"\w*: and thus \w did|strong="H6213"\w* he unto all the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*. So \w David|strong="H1732"\w* and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* unto \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.
